languages.text: "Все, кто был на палубе, мертв — включая напавших. Случившееся — целиком вина Идиры Тласс. Пришлите сервиторов и выкиньте ее из шлюза. Мне надоели ее выходки".

"Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."
languages.original_text: "Все, кто был на палубе, мертв — включая напавших. Случившееся — целиком вина Идиры Тласс. Пришлите сервиторов и выкиньте ее из шлюза. Мне надоели ее выходки".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

"Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

"Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

"Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

languages.text: “甲板上所有人都死了，袭击者也全都死了。发生这样的事情，完全是伊迪拉·特拉斯的错。让机仆把她从气闸里丢出去，我已经受够她的疯病了。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

traits.locale_text: “甲板上所有人都死了，袭击者也全都死了。发生这样的事情，完全是伊迪拉·特拉斯的错。让奴工把她从气闸里丢出去，我已经受够她的疯病了。”

languages.text: «Todos los que estaban en cubierta han muerto, incluyendo a los atacantes. Lo ocurrido ha sido exclusivamente culpa de Idira Tlass. Envíeme servidores y láncela por la esclusa; me he cansado de sus problemas».
languages.original_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los que estaban en cubierta han muerto, incluyendo a los atacantes. Lo ocurrido ha sido exclusivamente culpa de Idira Tlass. Envíeme servidores y láncela por la esclusa; me he cansado de sus problemas».

languages.text: 「デッキにいた者は、襲撃者も含めて全員死んだ。イディラ・トラスのせいだ。ここにサーヴィターを派遣し、エアロックから放り出せ。イディラのふざけた態度にはうんざりだ」
languages.original_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

traits.locale_text: 「デッキにいた者は、襲撃者も含めて全員死んだ。イディラ・トラスのせいだ。ここにサーヴィターを派遣し、エアロックから放り出せ。イディラのふざけた態度にはうんざりだ」

languages.text: "Alle auf dem Deck sind tot, auch die Angreifer. Was passiert ist, war allein die Schuld von Idira Tlass. Schickt ein paar Servitoren her und werft sie aus einer Luftschleuse. Ich bin ihre Eskapaden leid."
languages.original_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

traits.locale_text: "Alle auf dem Deck sind tot, auch die Angreifer. Was passiert ist, war allein die Schuld von Idira Tlass. Schickt ein paar Servitoren her und werft sie aus einer Luftschleuse. Ich bin ihre Eskapaden leid."

languages.text: « Tous ceux qui se trouvaient sur le pont sont morts, assaillants compris. Ce qui s'est passé était entièrement la faute d'Idira Tlass. Envoyez des servitors et éjectez-moi cette petite idiote par le premier sas venu, je l'ai assez vue. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

traits.locale_text: « Tous ceux qui se trouvaient sur le pont sont morts, assaillants compris. Ce qui s'est passé était entièrement la faute d'Idira Tlass. Envoyez des servitors et éjectez-moi cette petite idiote par le premier sas venu, je l'ai assez vue. »

languages.text: "Saldırganlar da dâhil güvertedeki herkes öldü. Yaşananlar tamamıyla İdira Tlass'ın suçu çıktı. Buraya birkaç hizmetör yollayın. Onu hava kilidinden salın gitsin, soytarılıklarından bıktım."
languages.original_text: "Everyone who was on the deck is dead, including the attackers. What happened was entirely the fault of Idira Tlass. Dispatch servitors here and put her out through an airlock, I am sick of her antics."

traits.locale_text: "Saldırganlar da dâhil, güvertedeki herkes öldü. Yaşananlar tamamıyla İdira Tlass'ın suçuydu. Buraya birkaç servitör yollayın ve onu hava kilidinden salın gitsin, bıktım soytarılıklarından."
